bill.title: Sergeant First Class Will Lindsay Memorial Highway
bill.description: Concerning the designation of a portion of Colorado State Highway 21 from Kettle Creek to Woodmen Road in El Paso County as the "SFC Will Lindsay Memorial Highway".

history.action: House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Signed by the President of the Senate
Signed by the Speaker of the House
